title: Why is Royal Guard Fiora losing her cleavage when the rest of her skins get to keep it?
body:
This is the only skin I own for her, because its one of my favorite in the game.
I don't see the reason as to why you're removing the cleavage for it and covering her up.
There's nothing wrong with it as it is.

replies.body: i really do like this skin over her other skins too bad riot doesn't give a fuck about it

It's a sad trend that's happening. We didn't even get ONE female human champ for the Pool Party this year. Riot's straying away from the fanservice and I'm saddened that they caved in to the feminists.

> [{quoted}](name=Rune Ocarina,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=xPgLBYBd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-22T01:26:56.018+0000)
>
> It's a sad trend that's happening. We didn't even get ONE female human champ for the Pool Party this year. Riot's straying away from the fanservice and I'm saddened that they caved in to the feminists.

Uhhhh. DJ Sona and Star Guardian Lux would like to have a word with you.
DJ Sona is the most covered champion. Star Guardian Lux is close behind.

> [{quoted}](name=Rune Ocarina,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=xPgLBYBd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-22T01:26:56.018+0000)
>
> It's a sad trend that's happening. We didn't even get ONE female human champ for the Pool Party. Riot's straying away from the fanservice and I'm saddened that they caved in to the feminists.

It's not the feminists.
I'm a feminist, and this isn't something I really approve of.
This is them being overly cautious and forgetting style and artistic merit. And overenforcing their new art direction that doesn't shape up with the previous design of the game.

We do have a poolparty female human champion, its Leona.

My bad. I knew of Leona but I meant of the ones released this year. 

And I'm also agreeing with you on them being more overly caution and think the feminist argument may have been too far - though the feminist argument could be a bit of a factor as to why they're overly cautious. The cigar for example, while silly, has nothing to do with feminists views but was included in the comment.

Either way, this Fiora VU sucks ass.

I also think all this talk of feminism, cleave, etc. is just politicising and clouding a very simple issue: the update is bad on a fundamental level, and to such a degree that the whole art-is-subjective thing really doesn't hold much weight.  If this goes through, and I'm sure it will because this isn't a just world and Riot is not a rational company, it'll be because Riot fucked up and wasn't man enough to accept that.
I meant pool party skin released this year. Leona was released two years ago, Lulu's a yordle, and Rek'sai's a monster.

But they're female, am I not correct? Just because they're not human doesn't make them exempt from this.

Everyone is beautiful, no matter what species or dimensional plane of origin they are from!
**Triumphantly holds sword for no reason**

**HUMAN FEMALE**

holy fuck people need to learn how to read

Mmmmm. Indeed. The least sexy of the champions.
http://i.imgur.com/acqgvrJ.gif
The loss of Fiora's cleavage is the least of her VU's problems.

WELL, I think it might have something to do with the _Royal Guard_  vibe: professional and not someone you want to fuck with. A _royal guard_ with a boob-window simply looks incompetent. The shade of yellow they used bothers me significantly more then anything else, it's super jarring and unpleasant.

Overall however, Fiora is pretty much the only champ I'm fine with in terms of the window, practicality-wise; looking back on dueling, normal clothes were worn, or just pants only to prevent cloth getting into wounds and causing an infection. (I mean, a guy walked all the way home after getting stabbed in the heart in a duel... and _then_ died)
